definition: body palpation (diagnostic method in TCM)/tactile examination
to touch/to make contact with sth/to stir up sb's emotions

sentences.english: It cannot easily be palpated on physical examination.
sentences.chinese: 通過體格檢查很難被觸診。

sentences.english: The pylorus may be palpated as a thick ring of muscle .
sentences.chinese: 可觸診出幽門是增厚的肌肉環。

sentences.english: We contrasted the findings of cervical palpation and B-ultrasonography with the pathologic diagnosis.
sentences.chinese: 將頸部觸診和B超檢查結果與術後病理診斷相對照。

sentences.english: In palpation, a doctor feels the shape and firmness of tissue.
sentences.chinese: 在觸診中，醫生能夠感受到組織的外形及硬度。

sentences.english: Lightly palpate most of the body, including arms and legs.
sentences.chinese: 淺部觸診身體大部分區域，包括手臂和腿。

sentences.english: Palpation and imaging confirms that he does have a thyroid nodule.
sentences.chinese: 觸診和影像學檢查證實他有甲狀腺結節腫。

sentences.english: In addition, intensity of murmurs may be gauged by palpating associated thrills.
sentences.chinese: 此外，還可通過觸診相關震顫推斷雜音的強度。

sentences.english: The JVP waves should be timed with simultaneous palpation of the carotid artery.
sentences.chinese: 計算頸靜脈搏動時應同步觸診頸動脈。

sentences.english: The liver is mobilized and carefully palpated bimanually.
sentences.chinese: 肝臟被動員並進行細緻的兩手觸診。

sentences.english: Palpation is best accomplished using the fingertips, with the patient either supine or in the left lateral decubitus position.
sentences.chinese: 觸診時最好用指尖，病人處仰臥位或左側臥位。

sentences.english: Intra- and interobserver reliability of passive motion palpation of the lumbar spine.
sentences.chinese: 區域內和觀察者觸診腰椎的可靠性被動的議案。

sentences.english: After all, doctors rely on such differences every time they palpate your abdomen.
sentences.chinese: 畢竟，每次腹部觸診醫生依靠的就是這種差異。

sentences.english: Therefore, the practice proved the palpation error coefficient is higher.
sentences.chinese: 所以，實踐證明觸診誤差率較高。

sentences.english: This can lead to palpation of an ill-defined "lump" in the breast.
sentences.chinese: 乳腺可觸診到不明原因的“腫塊”。

sentences.english: A large and firm liver could be easily palpated .
sentences.chinese: 觸診易摸到大而質硬的肝臟。

definition: (TCM) pulse feeling and palpitation, one of the four methods of diagnosis 四診|四诊[si4 zhen3]
popliteal (anatomy)/hollow at the back of the knee
lit. the disease is cured the moment the medicine is taken (idiom)/fig. (of a medical treatment) to give instant results/(of a solution or method) highly effective
sahasrāra or sahasrara, the crown or fontanel chakra 查克拉, residing at the top of the skull
to course the liver and rectify 氣|气[qi4] (TCM)
